The VZD is a central service of the TI platform

The document is primarily intended for providers and manufacturers of directory services

The VZD implements Verzeichnisdienste
The VZD performs actions on a daily basis
The VZD checks the validity of the certificate
The VZD performs an OCSP query
The VZD deletes invalid certificates
The VZD does not accept valid RU-/TU-certificates in PU
The VZD checks for professionalOID or entryType when adding certificates

node_2: werte der attribute professionoid und entrytype
edge: The VZD retains values of attributes professionOID and entryType
The VZD logs and retains changes made to directory entries for 6 months
The VZD does not store or log search queries
The VZD does not store copies of deleted data
The VZD stores private keys securely and prevents reading to prevent manipulation
The VZD ensures the integrity and authenticity of stored registration data of FAD
The VZD uses generic error codes for its SOAP interface
The VZD logs local and remote errors in its local storage
The VZD supports IPv4 and IPv6
The VZD securely stores the contents of the TSL
The provider of the VZD guarantees its extensibility for accepting data of new applications
The provider of the VZD guarantees the recording of the Fachdaten of new applications
The VZD can store 1,000,000 entries
The VZD handles the addition and removal of KOM-LE addresses
The VZD uses the interfaces according to the table of PT_VZD_Schnittstellen

The FAD checks if a corresponding Basisdatensatz exists for a Telematik-ID. If it does not exist, the FAD sends an error message.
The FAD can create a new Fachdatensatz if it does not exist, and it can delete or update an existing Fachdatensatz for a Telematik-ID.
The FAD can receive and send requests and responses, including add_Directory_FA-Attributes, modify_Directory_FA-Attributes, and delete_Directory_FA-Attributes requests.
The VZD must establish an LDAPS-Verbindungsaufbau for the FAD.
The VZD receives an Add-Request from the FAD.
The VZD sends an Response Operation to the FAD's Add-Request.
The VZD checks the KOM-LE_Version in the Operation Request against a list of valid values. If the value is invalid, the VZD sends a constraintViolation response.
The VZD ensures that each KOM-LE Adresse is attached to only one VZD-Eintrag.
The FAD and VZD can establish a TLS-Verbindung for communication.
The FAD sends a deleteDirectoryFAAttributes request to the VZD to delete a Fachdaten-Eintrag.
The VZD sends a responseMsg containing the status of the deleteDirectoryFAAttributes request to the FAD.
A gematik SOAP-Fault Response is sent when there are errors during the processing of the SOAP Request. The specific error scenarios are defined with faultcodes and faultstrings.
The Fehlerfälle are represented by protocol-specific error messages, such as TCP, HTTP, or TLS.
When an operation is executed incorrectly, the faultstring 'Operation fehlerhaft ausgeführt' is used.
When there are errors deleting Fachdaten due to issues with the Verzeichnisdienst, the faultstring 'Fachdaten konnten nicht gelöscht werden (Fehler im Verzeichnisdienst)' is used.

The VZD is responsible for implementing delete_Directory_FA-Attributes (LDAPv3) according to specific guidelines, including handling cases when no matching Basisdatensatz is found, deleting Fachdatensätze associated with a Telematik-ID, and utilizing specific Fehlermeldungen.
The FAD must support the technical use case TUC_VZD_0009, which includes delete_Directory_FA-Attributes(LDAPv3) according to the Tab_TUC_VZD_0009.

node_2: name, beschreibung, vorbedingungen, eingangsdaten, komponenten, ausgangsdaten, standardablauf, aktionen, fehlerfälle
edge: The delete_Directory_FA-Attributes (LDAPv3) operation includes details such as Name, Beschreibung, Vorbedingungen, Eingangsdaten, Komponenten, Ausgangsdaten, Standardablauf, Aktionen, and Fehlerfälle that describe its behavior and interaction with other components.
The VZD must implement delete_Directory_FA-Attributes following specific guidelines, such as handling cases when no matching Basisdatensatz is found and sending appropriate HTTP-Statuscodes.
The FAD must support the technical use case TUC_VZD_0013, which includes delete_Directory_FA-Attributes according to Tab_TUC_VZD_0013.

The VZD is required to implement the Spezifikation Verzeichnisdienst according to certain guidelines.
The Spezifikation Verzeichnisdienst includes an Operation called getInfo.
The Operation getInfo is a REST-Request GET.
The Operation getInfo delivers the Metadaten of the OpenAPI Spezifikation.
The VZD is required to implement the add_Directory_Entry Operation.
The add_Directory_Entry Operation is used to create a new entry in the LDAP-Verzeichnis.
The add_Directory_Entry Operation uses the Distinguished Name.
The VZD is responsible for the Pflege der Basiseinträge (Verzeichnisdienst_Eintrag) in the DirectoryEntry Administration.
The VZD must implement the 'modify_Directory_Entry' operation
The VZD must implement the 'delete_Directory_Entry' operation
The 'uid' parameter identifies the directory service entry to be updated
The 'uid' parameter identifies the directory service entry to be deleted
The 'holder' attribute must be checked by the VZD before updating the directory entry
The ACCESS_TOKEN claim scope must be checked by the VZD before updating the directory entry
The 'holder' attribute must be checked by the VZD before deleting the directory entry
The VZD must implement the 'delete_Directory_Entry' operation
The operation checks the attributes of the stored directory entry
The 'holder' attribute in the stored directory entry is checked

node_2: value of the access_token claim scope
edge: The value of the 'holder' attribute is compared to the value of the ACCESS_TOKEN claim scope
The VZD must implement the 'add_Directory_Entry_Certificate' operation
The operation adds a certificate entry to an existing base data set
The base data set is part of the Ldap directory
The operation reads the Zertifikatseinträge from the Ldap directory
The Zertifikatseinträge are filtered based on the filter parameters
The filter parameters can be uid, certificateEntryID, telematikID

The VZD must ensure that the 'holder' search parameter contains the same value as the ACCESS_TOKEN claim scope, the pagingSize does not exceed the maximum size as per TIP1-A_5552, and the search parameters do not change during paging (with multiple Request/Response sequences). If there are deviations from these specifications, the VZD must respond with an error (HTTP- Status-Code 403).

The client of the interface I_Directory_Administration must use a TLS-Verbindung with server-side authentication. It must check the server certificate of the VZD. If the result is negative, the connection attempt must be aborted.

The VZD must implement the logical data model as shown in Abb_VZD_logisches_Datenmodell and Tab_VZD_Datenbeschreibung. It must ensure that an entry only contains certificates from the trust environment of the TI with the same Telematik-ID.
The givenName is optional for the HBA-Eintrag, it is taken over from the certificate by the VZD.
The VZD must recognize the LDAP-Directory fields such as givenName, sn, cn, streetAddress etc. and take them over from the certificate or generate default values if necessary.
The cn is obligatory for the HBA Eintrag, it is taken over from the certificate by the VZD and used for searching and displaying entries.

The specialization can occur multiple times for the Leistungserbringerorganisationen, the value range corresponds to the defined values for XDS (e.g.: urn:psc:1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.3.276.1.5.4:ALLG for general medicine).
The VZD uses Basisdaten as part of its data structure
The VZD uses Fachdaten as part of its data structure
The VZD uses Datenstruktur komLeData as part of its data structure

node_1: im zertifikat enthaltene oid (extension admission, attribut professionoid)
edge: The im Zertifikat enthaltene OID (Extension Admission, Attribut ProfessionOID) is used to automatically enter the ProfessionOID

node_1: im jeweiligen zertifikat enthaltene telematik-id (feld registrationnumber der extension admission)
edge: The im jeweiligen Zertifikat enthaltene Telematik-ID (Feld registrationNumber der Extension Admission) is used to populate the telematikID
Each Mail Adresse corresponds to one komLeData Entry
The Eintragstyp is mapped to the ProfessionOID
Leistungserbringer- institution can have multiple Betriebsstätte
gematik can have multiple Betriebsstätte
The VZD is responsible for implementing a configurable mapping from professionOID to entryType for fachanwendungsspezifischer Diensts.
fachanwendungsspezifischer Dienst has a professionOID which is mapped to entryType by VZD
VZD is responsible for mapping professionOID to entryType
Gesamtbetriebsverantwortlicher der TI initiates a change in the mapping of professionOID to entryType
